Holiday Import

📋 How to Import Historical Holidays

  1. Create and populate your own Excel file
  2. Fill in: Staff Name, Start Date, End Date, Reason (Hours/Sessions are optional)
  3. Upload the completed Excel file below
  4. Choose to either:
    • Enter hours/sessions manually in the preview table, or
    • Enter hours/sessions for each staff member (these will be used by default)
  5. Review the data and click "Confirm Upload"
  6. Select the appropriate user from the dropdown and click "Match & Transfer" to assign holidays

Training Import

📋 How to Import Training Records

  1. Download the Excel template and Training Types list
  2. Fill in: Staff Name, Training Type (must match exactly from list), Completion Date
  3. Upload the completed Excel file below
  4. Review type matches and correct any mismatches
  5. Select users and click "Match & Transfer" to assign training
⚠️ Important: Training Type names must match exactly from the Training Types list. The system will attempt to match similar names, but exact matches work best.
